title: The.Outsiders.TheCompleteNovel.ReSeed - AliaIactaEst
description:
Hello All:

AliaIactaEst

Based on the novel by S.E. Hinton - this is the definitive version of  - The Outsiders - Directed by Francis Ford Coppola, and launched the careers of such stars as:

Patrick Swayze, Tom Cruise, Emilio Estevez, Matt Dillon, Ralph Macchio, C.Thomas Howell, Rob Lowe, Glenn Withrow, Diane Lane, Leif Garrett, and a whole slew of other young actors that went on to have fabulous careers.

It is digitally Re-Mastered from the original negative and is completely re-edited and remastered with 22 minutes of additional footage, previously unseen - making the film more true to the novel. 

In addition Francis Coppola dropped the original Gone With The Wind style, melodramatic musical score, and re-edited the film with a new Rock n Roll sound track, true to the era of story and the characters.  It also begins with a brief introduction by the director, and several of the stars of the film.

I enjoyed the original release of the film - I absolutely LOVE this new version - and I thought you might like it as well.

And please check out some of my other torrents - I try to give as much as possible to the p2p as its given me - with something a little different...

Enjoy

Format: .avi
Aspect Ratio: Letterbox 2:35:1
Audio: mp3
Quality: High
